verbose_text: As reported, administration of P1 or P4 BMMSCs significantly alleviated DSS induced body weight loss, diarrhea, bloody stool, colon inflammation and damage, and totally prevented the death of colitis rats (n = 4, p < 0.001).
evidence: P1 or P4 BMMSCs significantly alleviated DSS-induced body weight loss                   , diarrhea, bloody stool                   , colon inflammation and damage                           , and totally prevented the death
